Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute near 119th/Wood
ShortDescription: 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 119th/Wood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 119th/Wood.

Southbound buses will operate via 119th, Ashland, 115th, Vincennes, 119th, then resume their normal route.

Northbound buses will operate via 119th, Vincennes, 115th, Marshfield, 119th, then resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute near Roosevelt/Lawndale
ShortDescription: #12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near Roosevelt/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near Roosevelt/Lawndale.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, Independence, Douglas, Central Park, then resume their normal route on Roosevelt.
  • Westbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, Central Park, Polk, Independence, then resume normal route on Roosevelt.

Allow extra travel time.
